Which of the following are the functions used to reap the process
Which of the following function is used to load and run the new programs. (Check all that apply)

activity_json.title: Shell Lab - Code part 2
activity_json.text:
1. Walk through the rest of the functions defined in tsh.c such as
    a. fgpid()
    b. getjobpid()
    c. getjobjid()
    d. pid2jid()
    e. unix_error()
    f. app_error()
    g. Signal()
    h. sigquit_handler()
  2. Feel free to meet your respective mentor in clarifying your questions.
    Note: Get ready for the viva by this weekend which carries 10 marks.

activity_json.title: Activity - 5
activity_json.text:
1. Start implementing the code for eval() function builtin_command() in your shell lab. (tsh.c)
  2. Check your solution against the following test cases. Run the following commands and observe the output. If there is a change in the output, go back change your simple shell (tsh). (tshref is an executable file of the official solution).
    a. ./sdriver.pl -t trace01.txt -s ./tshref -a "-p"
    ./sdriver.pl -t trace01.txt -s ./tsh -a "-p"

    b. ./sdriver.pl -t trace02.txt -s ./tshref -a "-p"
    ./sdriver.pl -t trace02.txt -s ./tsh -a "-p"

    c. ./sdriver.pl -t trace03.txt -s ./tshref -a "-p"
    ./sdriver.pl -t trace03.txt -s ./tsh -a "-p"

    d. ./sdriver.pl -t trace04.txt -s ./tshref -a "-p"
    ./sdriver.pl -t trace04.txt -s ./tsh -a "-p"

questionText.text: Write a C Program that create 10 children processes that prints their process id and the parent has to reap all the child processes by printing their exit status of the children.
Run and understand the code given in Figure: 8.28 Write a description of each and every line as comments.
Write the summary of the group discussion and submit the Google doc link
